ground_truth.thought: 基于我的虚拟现实项目，提供一些融资建议
ground_truth.name: VirtualRealityFinance.get_funding_advice

args.project_description: 开发一个虚拟现实教育平台，旨在通过沉浸式体验提高学生的学习兴趣和效果。

origin_prompt.content:

[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 我是一名创业者，正在开发一个虚拟现实项目。我想了解虚拟现实的融资途径。首先，获取虚拟现实融资的基本概念和常见方式。然后，获取一些虚拟现实企业的融资案例。接着，获取当前虚拟现实行业的融资趋势。最后，基于我的虚拟现实项目，提供一些融资建议。
获取虚拟现实融资的基本概念和常见方式
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
VirtualRealityFinance.get_funding_basics
当前工具的参数是什么?

{'funding_basics': 'Virtual reality (VR) projects typically seek funding through venture capital, angel investors, crowdfunding platforms, and government grants. Common methods include seed funding, Series A/B/C rounds, and initial public offerings (IPOs).'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'funding_basics': 'Virtual reality (VR) projects typically seek funding through venture capital, angel investors, crowdfunding platforms, and government grants. Common methods include seed funding, Series A/B/C rounds, and initial public offerings (IPOs).'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

VirtualRealityFinance.get_case_studies

{'case_studies': '1. Oculus VR raised $91 million in venture capital before being acquired by Facebook for $2 billion. 2. Magic Leap secured $1.9 billion in funding from investors including Alibaba and Google. 3. Varjo Technologies has raised $100 million in funding to develop high-resolution VR headsets.'}
